title: Kouya no Kotobuki Hikoutai
alternative_title: Kotobuki: The Wasteland Squadron, 荒野のコトブキ飛行隊
description: In a barren frontier where people trade goods with each other in order to help each other survive. The Kotobuki Squadron are bodyguards for hire, led by a strict but beautiful squadron leader, an unreliable commanding officer, and a true artisan of a crew chief. Alongside pilots who don't lack for personality, they take to the air in dogfights, letting the engine noise of their Hayabusa fighters ring out in the skies.
